articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Europe is heading for Covid-19 'ceasefire' that could lead to 'enduring peace', WHO says - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: This comes as a growing number of European nations lift almost all Covid-19 restrictions.
articles.content: THE WORLD HEALTH Organization has offered Europe hope of a long period of tranquility and even enduring peace in the war on coronavirus, with a growing list of nations lifting almost all Covid curbs.… [+3909 chars]

articles.title: Mars-bound astronauts can avoid aggression, muscle loss with hibernation during trips - Republic World
articles.description: A European Space Agency (ESA) study has suggested that putting astronauts into hibernation could be the best way to ensure their safe trip to Mars
